083-3b @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ bi b+hang+ga gu h+ya tan+t+ra NAM tri ru dra da ma naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i rgyud rnams kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje yis/ /gsang ba'i don 'di yang dag zhus/ /sgrub dang gnas dang mtshan nyid gang / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ /shes rab snying rje gsang dbang ldan/ /lcags 'dra'i ri dang bya skyibs dang / /nags tshal mthug dang mchod rten nang / /zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa che/ /mche ba gtsigs pa nag po ste/ /dkar po g.yas te khros pa'i mdog /hU~M sgrogs me lce 'bar ba'i dbugs/ /dmar ser g.yon te bzhad pa'i zhal/ /spyan dmar me dpung dang 'dra ba/ /zla ba rgyas pa lta bu'i zhal/ /nor rgyas dung skyong ser pos dbu/ /dga' bo nye dga' snyan cha dmar/ /dpung pa pad ma chu lha dkar/ /se ral 'dab bzangs rigs ldan gnag /tsham ngam rdo rje sdigs mdzub dang / /thal mos bdud 'joms sbrul nag 'dzin/ /zhal gsum pa ste 'jigs pa che/ /sku gsum dag gis rab tu mtshan/ /pho nya gsum gyis gdug pa 'dul/ /klu yi gnyen po gnod sbyin bdag /bdud 'dul tshangs pa'i pho nya ni/ /zla ba nyi ma dag gi steng / /glang chen kar ka gser gyi gdan/ /brgya byin ser po rdo rje 'dzin/ /tshangs pa ral gri pad ma 'dzin/ /klu 'dul sbrul nag 'dzin pa'o/ /bdud 'dul dbang po nyi ma'i steng / /gnod sbyin zla dang stobs kyi steng / /klu 'dul ri steng rgya mtsho'i nang / /sbrul nag 'khyil pa stobs ldan te/ /

7
083-4a mkha' dang ri bos mnan pa'i steng / /gser mdog stobs gnyis gser gyi gdan/ /brgyad khrir zhabs bzhag ri rab mnan/ /me dpung sku la 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /khams gsum khyab mdzad khro bo 'phro/ /sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i skur phyag 'tshal/ /de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /rdo rje me dpung 'od dang ldan/ /de nyid mkha' dang 'byung ba las/ /dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'i gnas/ /bdag po'i sa bon las byung ba/ /zla nyi thod pa rdo rje las/ /drag po'i rtags ldan gtso bo che/ / mdzes ldan sku la yang dag 'khril/ /drag chen 'dul mdzad dri za'i gtso/ /mdog dkar rtse gsum 'bar ba 'dzin/ /'od 'phro dkar mo sku la 'khril/ /'joms mdzad spu gri 'bar ba 'dzin/ /mgon po gzi brjid gshin rje'i bdag /mdog ser dbyug thos gshin rje 'dul/ /mdangs ldan ser mo sku la 'khril/ /'ja' 'dra ba yi zangs gri bsnams/ /'brug sgra sgrogs pa klu yi gtso/ /mdog dmar klu 'dul sbrul gyi zhags/ /sgra yi lha mo sku la 'khril/ /mdog dmar gcod pa'i ste'u bsnams/ /phrin las khro bo gnod sbyin bdag /ljang nag be con gnod sbyin 'dul/ /rlung 'byin ljang gu sku la 'khril/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams/ /'gugs pa lcags kyu lcags kyu ste/ /sdud pa zhags pa zhags pa'i bdag /sdom pa lcags sgrog lcags sgrog ste/ /zhi mdzad dril bu dril bu zhi/ /kha sbyor bde dang longs spyod dang / /chos dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo la/ /sa bon rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /thabs dang shes rab sreg gso mdzad/ /nyi ma zla ba'i 'phro 'du las/ /thig le'i rang bzhin mi shigs la/ / gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba las le'u dang po'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i sngags ni khyod kyis zung / /las rnams thams cad 'grub pa dang / /sdig pa dag ni zhi ba'i phyir/ /klu

8
083-4b dang gnod sbyin bsdigs pa dang / /bdud rnams ma lus zhi byed pa'i/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas byin brlabs pa'i/ /rdo rje can gyi sngags bshad bya/ /tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho pan nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i dan nI lAm ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badzra pA Ni hr-i da ya~M/ yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha mA ku loh+sAd naM b+hA biSh+yan+ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ bi bud d+ha bi bud d+ha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ ha ra ha ra nA gA nAn/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nA~M/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha nA ga marmA Ni Ni/ bi shIr+yan tu nA ga shA rI rA Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya nA ni/ tad+ya thA/ hU~M phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hU~M phaT/ nA go ta sA da nA ya hU~M phaT/ nI lA~M ba sa nA ya hU~M phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA gra mA ya phaT/ kr-i tAn tA ya phaT/ kr-i tAn ta rU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha Na ya phaT/ tra sa nA ya phaT/ kush+mAN+Dot+sAd nA ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a pa smA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba bi g+h+nA~M/ binA she ka rA ya phaT/ sarba sha trUM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lA~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ zhes pa phreng ba'i gsang ba'i sngags so/ /sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gis gsungs pa'i/ /rig sngags 'dis ni sdig pa thams cad 'dag pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ las thams cad 'grub pa yin te/ de yang rig pa 'dzin pas sgrub ste dam tshig dang ldan pas so/ /de yang bla ma la gus shing / /yi dam dkon mchog la dad cing / /byang chub sems dang sdom pa dang / /lha dang sngags la gus pa dang / /rgyun tu rnal 'byor dang ldan te/ /rgyud don don la brtson ldan na/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin mdzad de bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ dam tshig dag las 'das na las rnams mi 'grub cing / /dag pa med dang don med dag ste

9
083-5a 'bras bu gang du skye 'gyur zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje dmyal ba'i nang du mi zad pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe'i tshad ji tsam du sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhes zhus pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /skrag par ma byed cig /'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs bshig ste thugs dang 'gal bas rdo rje gdan nam zhig tsam na thar bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gdan nam 'jig par 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi sems can thams cad sangs rgyas ba'i 'bras bu thob ste rdo rje gdan 'jig ste thar bar 'gyur ro/ /bar ma do dang skye gnas 'jig pa dag yod do/ /de'i gsang ba'i sngags ni zla ba'i steng du yi ge a bkod de/ chos nyid dag pa'i sngags brjod do/ /na maHsa man ta badzra NAM sarba d+harma tA badzra satwa hUM/ zhes phyogs bcur kha bltas te rdo rje thal mo sbyar te ye shes kyi 'od kyis gsol ba btab la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i skur mos par bya'o/ /oM badzra satwa hUM zhes pa 'bum du brjod na rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'jigs byed che/ /me long me long gsal ba'i sku/ /zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa che/ /mtshon cha 'dzin la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs/ /chos dbyings chos dbyings rnam par dag /zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /so sor kun rtog kun rtog bral/ /pad ma dri med pad ma'i bdag /zhal gsum phyag drug rta skad sgrogs/ /zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin/ /rgya mtsho skyes sku phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rin chen bai DUr gzi brjid 'bar/ /mnyam pa mnyam nyid ye shes sku/ /zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin/ /rin chen rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal bstod/ /las kyi sku ste phrin las mdzad/ /bya ba bya ba sgrub pa'i bdag /zhal gsum

10
083-5b phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin/ /phrin las rgya mtshor phyag 'tshal bstod/ /oM A nan ta pa ra swA hA/ oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ A kar Sha ya ban d+ha ya swA hA/ ha ya grI ba ban d+ha sho ka swA hA/ oM a pa re a pa rA dzi ta swA hA/ ro Sha NA ya b+h+yaHphaT/ /de nas lha'i gsang sngags brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ mA ra ya tsit+ta tsit+ta rbad rbad/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA kA lA ya hUM phaT/ tsit+ta la kro d+hi duny+dza/ oM badzra kro d+ha nA ga hUM phaT/ mA ra ya raka ta rngubs rngubs/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i te hUM phaT/ mA ra ya sod sod rbad/ de nas lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis rig pa phul ba/ ma hA de ba mA ra ya sod sod/ ma hA yak+Sha a su ra mA ra ya ha na ha na/ nA ga rA dza mA ra ya dzaHdzaHma hA ma ni mA ra ya rngubs rngubs/ ma hA b+h+ruM mA ra ya tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA yak+Sha mA ra ya b+hin da b+hin da/ kharga mA ra ya khos khos/ ma hA brah+ma de ye phaT/ mA ra Na sod sod/ mA ra Na bying bying / mA ra Na mugs mugs/ mA ra Na ha la ha la/ mA ra Na d+hu na d+hu na/ mA ra Na myos myos/ mA ra Na bying bying / thum ri li li/ thum ri li li/ dzaHdzaH/ bum pa legs par ldan pa yis/ /sman gsum rtsi sman sna tshogs dang / /kha di ra yi lo 'dab bcas/ /lcags kyi rdo rje'i khong seng du/ /gsang ba'i sngags ni brjod par bya/ /gnam lcags mchu ni stong ba ru/ /sprin bral ser ba bcad pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM Tak+ki tsa ti gu h+ya li mi Sha sha gu gu/ sha ti bi ti/ hu ya hu ya/ pu ru ta swA hA/ oM badzra pA Ni badzra tA ki nI nA ga he he/ hu ya hu ya/ hu lu hu lu/ pu ru te pu ru te swA hA/ oM many+dzu shrI ya mAn ta ka /e kA pa ra hUM phaT/ oM ma NI pad me be sha pra be sha mA ma ru lu be sha kha thun b+h+yo/ oM brah+ma swa sti/ puSh+TiM su ra kau shi ka /ru dra I shwa ra/ biSh+Nu/ I sha ni/ ku mA ra shaM ka ra/ sma ra sha trU~M swA hA/ oM karko Ta/ ku li ka /pad ma/ ma hA pad ma/ a nan ta/ tAk+Sha ka /

11
083-6a bA su ki /shang kha pA la/ nA ga rA dza swA hA/ oM A di t+ya/ sau ma aM gA ra/ bu d+haHbr-i ha spa tiH/ shu kraH/ sa nai sh+tsA ra/ ke tu swA hA/ oM nak+Sha tra/ kAr ti ka /ro haM Ni/ mr-i ga shi raH/ ar+d+raHpu narba suH/ pu ShaHa sh+le ShaH/ ma g+hA/ pU ra ba phal gu NI/ uta tar phal gu NI ha stA tsi trA swa ti/ bi shA khA/ a nu rA d+ha/ dz+yeSh+ThA mU laM purbA ShA D+hA/ ut+ta rA ShA D+hA/ shra waNaHa bi dzi ta/ sha ta b+hi Sha d+ha ni Sh+ThaHpUr wa b+ha dra pa dA/ ut+ta ra b+ha dra pa dA/ re ba tI a shwi nI b+ha ra NI swA hA/ oM in+d+ra/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku ber ag+ni rAk+Shas/ bA ya be/ I shA na sUr+ya/ tsan+d+ra lo ka pA lA ya swA hA/ oM bai shra ba NaH/ dr-i D+ha rASh+T+ra/ bi rU bAk+Sha D+ha ka/bi rU pAk+Sha swA hA/ oM de ba nA ga rA dzA su ra gan d+har wash+tsa/ ga ru Ta/ kin+na ra/ ma ho ra ga /ku~M b+hAN+Da swA hA/ ha ra ha ra nA ga phuH/ pra ha ra pra ha ra sar+b+ba nA ga phuH/ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ nA ga hr-i da yA ni phuH/ b+hin da b+hin da nA ga ma rma Ni phuH/ bi shir+Yan+tu nA ga sha rI rA Ni phuH/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya nA ya na ni phuH/ nA ga bi dA ra nA ya phuH/ nA got+sA da nA ya phuHswA hA/ yak+Sha bi dA ra NA ya hU~M phaT/ yak+Sha kro d+ha sA da nA ya hU~M phaT/ yak+Sha ni la~M ba sa nA ya phaT swA hA/ yak+Sha a pra ti ha ta ba lA ya phaT/ yak+Sha pa ra kra mA ya phaT/ yak+Sha kr-i tAn tA ya phaT/ yak+Sha kr-i tAn tA rU pA ya phaT/ yak+Sha ro Sha NA ya phaT/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams cad dbang du 'dus par gyur to/ /gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba las gsang ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas cho ga yang dag bshad/ /maN+Dal me tog bcas pa'i steng / /mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa dang / /bum pa sngon po mgul chings bcas/ /mchod pa rnam lnga dang ldan pas/ /sgrub po dag ni smyung ldan pas/ /rmi ltas rim pa gsal ba yis/ /nad pa dag la yungs sngags so/ /bcom ldan mgon po zhal gsum dmar/ /phyag drug rdo rje

12
083-6b sdigs pa g.yon/ /drag po'i thal mos 'jigs par byed/ /tha ma sbrul gdug ri rab mnan/ /'khor du gnod sbyin chen po ste/ /sha za rab 'jigs ral pa can/ /gdong ser seng gdong gnod sbyin mo/ /bong bu'i rna ba rna ba 'phyang / /ral ba gyen 'greng ral gri so/ /gnod sbyin 'khor te lnga brgyar bcas/ /yak+Sha bi dA ra NA ya hU~M phaT/ yak+Sha kro d+ha sA da nA ya hU~M phaT/ yak+Sha ni la~M bas nA ya hU~M phaT/ yak+Sha pra ti ha ta bA lA ya hU~M phaT/ yak+Sha pa rA kra mA ya phaT/ yak+Sha kr-i tAn+tA ya phaT/ yak+Sha kr-i tAn ta rU pA ya phaT/ yak+Sha ro Sha NA ya phaT/ zhes brjod de chu la bsngags shing gtor na gnod sbyin gyi gdon las thar ro/ /mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa'i drung / /tshon sna lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /mchod pa lnga dang ldan pas mchod/ /sgrub po dag ni smyung ldan pas/ /rmi ltas rim pa gsal ba yis/ /nad pa dag la tshon snas bcing / /bcom ldan mgon po zhal gsum ldan/ /phyag drug rdo rje sdigs pa g.yon/ /drag po'i thal mos 'jigs par byed/ /tha ma sbrul gdug ri rab mnan/ /mkha' la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan bdud/ /dga' rab dbang phyug thod phreng can/ /bum sna sen dgu sha za bdud/ /btsun mo me tog mdzes ma dang / /'od zer 'phrog dang mdangs 'phrog ma/ /gdon rigs stong phrag brgyad cu'i 'khor/ /ma lus bcas pa'i sngags 'di ni/ /gnad la bor ba'i srog sngags so/ /pre ta pi shA tsa bi d+ha ra NA ya hU~M phaT/ pre ta pi sha tsa kro d+ha sa d+ha nA ya hU~M phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa ni la~M wa sa na ya hU~M phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa a pra ti ha ta ba la ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa pa rA kra mA ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa kr-i tAn+tA ya phaT/ pre ta pi sha tsa kr-i tAn+ta rU pA ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa ro Sha NA ya phaT/ nyi ma zla ba dag gi bar du rlung la bskyon te/ tshon sne lngas bcings te bskrad par bya'o/ /mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa'i drung / /maN+Dal me tog bcas pa'i steng / /smyung

13
083-7a bas khyi yi sha la bsgrub/ /rmi ltas rim pa ldan pas brtag /brgyad khri zhabs nub 'jigs pa'i cha/ /gad rgyangs bzhad mdzad zhal gsum pa/ /nag po zhabs gdug gdug pa 'dzin/ /stobs chen rab tu gnon pa po/ /klu chen ma rungs gdug pa can/ /nor rgyas dang ni dung skyong dang / /dga' bo dang ni 'jog po dang / /pad ma pad ma chen po'o/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan rnams/ /rgya mtsho dag la gnas pa yi/ /klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag gsum/ /sprul pa las las grub pa yi/ /glen pa nga rgyal rdzu 'phrul can/ /sprul pa 'bum sde 'khor dang bcas/ /ma lus pa yi sngags 'di ni/ /gnad la bor ba'i rtsa sngags so/ /ha ra ha ra nA ga phuH/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA ga phuH/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA ga phuH/ b+hin da b+hin da nA ga phuH/ bi shIr+yan+tu nA ga sha rI rA Ni phuH/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga nA ya na ni phuH/ nA ga bi dA ra Na ya phuH/ nA ga kro d+ha sA da nA ya phuH/ bal po se'u dag dang ni/ /smag shad dag gi lcug mas byab/ /de ni klu bzlog par byed pa'i cho ga'o/ /nA ga du na dus/ nA ga shon dus/ hi li hi li nA ga dus dus/ klu chen nA ga'i srog snying ste/ /gnad la bor ba'i srog snying ngo / /lto 'phye dag gi kha nas khar/ /bcom ldan sku ni gsal bas bzlas/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin la bka' stsal pa/ las rnams bzhi yis las rnams 'grub/ /sa gzhi dag ni so sor brtag /zhi ba dkar zlum pad ma can/ /rgyas ser gru bzhi 'khor lo'o/ /dbang dmar zla gam lcags kyu ste/ /drag po mthing nag rtse gsum pa'o/ /zhi ba rgyas pa sor bzhi dang / /khru gang khru do mnyam pa'o/ /dbang dang drag po sor gsum ste/ / khru gang khru do khru gsum khru/ /'o ma can dang dri zhim shing / /'bras bu dang bcas zhi rgyas shing / /tsher ma dur khrod shing dag ni/ /kha dog dmar nag dbang drag la/ /ku sha dag kyang dgram bya ste/ /las kyi bum pas bsang bar bya'o/ /zhi ba zho dang mar dang ni/ /

14
083-7b 'o ma dri zhim me tog dkar/ /'bras dang nas dang gro dang ni/ /zho yi cha dang bsres pa dbul/ /rgyas pa zho sbags dkar gsum ste/ /mngar gsum 'bras bu gsum dag ste/ /yam shing 'o ma lo 'dab bcas/ /til ni dkar po shis pa'o/ /khwa dang 'ug pa bya rog brun/ /ske tshe nim pa yungs kar dang / /khrag gis sbags pa'i rdzas kun te/ /yam shing tsher ma mar dag dang / /sha dang tshil dang gzugs bcas pa/ /til ni nag po shis pa'o/ /shar du bltas na zhi ba ste/ /byang du bltas na rgyas pa'o/ /nub tu bltas na dbang du sdud/ /lto ru bltas te gsad par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg byas pas las kun 'grub/ /g.yas brkyang dbang gi 'dug pa ste/ /g.yon brkyang pas ni gsad pa'o/ /bum pa kha dog sngon po ste/ /gnam lcags sor ni bcu drug tshad/ /sman lnga 'bru lnga rin po che/ /'bras gsum 'bru gsum bcas pa ste/ /dri zhim lo 'dab bcas pa'i shing / /ba yi rnam lnga khru do'i tshad/ /gru bzhi khru gang zlum po ste/ /seng ldeng bzhi las byas pa yi/ /phur pa tshon sna dang bcas pa/ /dkar gsum mngar gsum dang bcas pa'i/ /gdengs ka can la dbul bar bya'o/ /grub pa khrus bya bsrung bar bya'o/ /'bras chan bu ram hwags dang ni/ /'bru yi chan dang dri zhim dang / /dkar gsum mngar gsum chu dag dang / /mdun du byas te phyogs rnams su/ / sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang / /nas dang 'bras dang gro la sogs/ /la phug sgog pa 'bru la sogs/ /chang dang bcas pa mdun du 'bul/ oM brah+ma/ oM biSh+Nu/ oM ru drA ya/ oM kAr ti ka /oM ga Na pa ti/ oM in drA ya/ oM ma hA kA la/ oM ma hA brah+mA ya/ ba lin ta ta le/ ba lin ta ta le swA hA/ stag dang khab len ti tsa dang / maN+Dal gru gsum steng du gzhag /nag po'i thod pa gri gug can/ /bsrung dang ldan pas gsang sngags bsgrub/ /ma hA kA la mi rU pa NA/ oM shrI gr-i bo be da dzaHdzaHha ha/

15
083-8a sa ma ya gags sol/ lcags kyi snying phyung zhes pas lcags la bya'o/ /nad kyi srung ba dag la ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skur gsal la/ /snying ga'i sa bon me 'bar bas/ /nad kun ma lus bsreg par bya'o/ /oM bi dug lu ma pra ti bai ro swA hA/ 'bru dang sman dang khur ba dang / /rin po che dang chang dang sha/ /rkang dang la du dkar gsum dang / /mngar gsum bcas pa'i gtor ma dang / /chu yi 'gram mam rgya mtshor dbul/ /me tog bdug pa bcas par dbul/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te sa~M b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra hU~M/ gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par 'byed pa/ drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba las/ las bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o/ /rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba pur+N+Na ma ti dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o/ /
